rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because responsibility for fire safety in Wales is devolved to the Welsh Government and Assembly.

You can petition the Welsh Assembly here:

http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx

You could start a new petition calling for such a law in England if that's what you would like to see.
